trans-unit.source: Represents a complex shape that may be composed of arcs, curves, ellipses, lines, and rectangles.
trans-unit.target: 代表可能由弧線、 曲線、 橢圓形、 線條和矩形的複雜圖形。

trans-unit.source: Each PathGeometry object defines a collection of <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> objects.
trans-unit.target: 每個 PathGeometry 物件定義的集合<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>物件。</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>

trans-unit.source: Each of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> objects is composed of one or more <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> objects, such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.LineSegment>, which actually define their shape.
trans-unit.target: 每個<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>物件組成的一或多個<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment>物件，例如<xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.LineSegment>，它會實際定義其圖形。</xref:System.Windows.Media.LineSegment> </xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>

trans-unit.source: The filled area of the PathGeometry is defined by taking all of the contained <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> objects that have their <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure.IsFilled%2A> property set to `true` and applying the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.FillRule%2A> to determine the enclosed area.
trans-unit.target: 擷取包含所有動作，藉此定義 PathGeometry 填滿的區域<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>物件具有其<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure.IsFilled%2A>屬性設定為`true`及套用<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.FillRule%2A>判斷括住的區域。</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.FillRule%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure.IsFilled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref> class with the specified <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.Figures*>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref>指定<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.Figures*>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.Figures*>類別

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.Figures*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref> which describes the contents of the <xref href="System.Windows.Shapes.Path"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.Figures*>的<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref>用來描述的內容<xref href="System.Windows.Shapes.Path"> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.Figures*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref> class with the specified <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.Figures*>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.FillRule*>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Transform*>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref>類別具有指定<> *>， <> </> *>，和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Transform*>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Transform*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.Figures*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref> which describes the contents of the <xref href="System.Windows.Shapes.Path"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.Figures*>的<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref>用來描述的內容<xref href="System.Windows.Shapes.Path"> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.Figures*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.FillRule*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.FillRule*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.FillRule*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Transform*> which specifies the transform applied.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Transform*>指定套用的轉換。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Transform*>

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> into a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathFigure"></xref> objects and adds it to the path.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的轉換<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref>集合的<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathFigure"></xref>物件，並將它加入至路徑。

trans-unit.source: **Note:** If the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> is animated, the conversion from <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> to <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathFigure"></xref> may result in some loss of information.
trans-unit.target: **注意︰**如果指定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref>動畫效果，從轉換<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref>至<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathFigure"></xref>可能造成部分遺失的資訊。

trans-unit.source: The geometry to add to the path.
trans-unit.target: 要加入至路徑的幾何。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> that specifies the bounding box of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref> ，指定這個週框方塊<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: **Note:** This method does not take any pens into account.
trans-unit.target: **注意︰**這個方法不採用任何筆納入考量。

trans-unit.source: If animations are present, the base values of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> object are used to calculate the bounding box.
trans-unit.target: 如果動畫會呈現，基底值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>物件用來計算週框方塊。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>

trans-unit.source: The bounding box of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 此週框方塊<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Removes all <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathFigure"></xref> objects from this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 移除所有<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathFigure"></xref>從這個物件<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 建立可修改複製品這個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"> </xref>，製作這個物件值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 （但可能已不能再解析），但不是動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 複製的物件<> *> 屬性會是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使來源的<> *> 屬性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 建立可修改複製品這個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref>物件，製作這個物件目前值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不會複製資源參考、 資料繫結和動畫，但是其目前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 複製的物件<> *> 屬性會是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使來源的<> *> 屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref> version of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref>版本指定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If the specified geometry is animated, its current animated values are used when constructing the new <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry> (although the animations themselves are not copied).
trans-unit.target: 建構新時，如果指定的幾何的動畫，會使用目前的動畫的值<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry>（雖然不會複製其本身的動畫）。</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry>

trans-unit.source: If the geometry is animated, the conversion may result in some loss of precision.
trans-unit.target: 如果幾何動畫，轉換可能會導致部分有效位數遺失。

trans-unit.source: The geometry from which to create a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 要從中建立幾何<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref> created from the current values of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"> </xref>從目前的值，指定建立<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathFigure"></xref> objects that describe the path's contents.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定集合<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathFigure"></xref>說明路徑內容的物件。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *moveAndDrawCommands* One or more move and draw commands.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 屬性使用方式``` ``` # # XAML 屬性項目用法``` ``` # # XAML 值*moveAndDrawCommands*一或多個移動和繪製命令。

trans-unit.source: See [Path Markup Syntax](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[路徑標記語法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: *oneOrMoreFigures* <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure?displayProperty=fullName> One or more <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> objects.
trans-unit.target: *oneOrMoreFigures* <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure?displayProperty=fullName>一或多個<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>物件。</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathFigure"></xref> objects that describe the path's contents.
trans-unit.target: 集合<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathFigure"></xref>說明路徑內容的物件。

trans-unit.source: Each individual <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathFigure"></xref> describes a shape.
trans-unit.target: 每個個別<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathFigure"></xref>描述一個圖形。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.Figures*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.Figures*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.Figures*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines how the intersecting areas contained in this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref> are combined.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值會決定如何在這個含之交集區域<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref>結合。

trans-unit.source: **EvenOdd** Determines the "insideness" of a point on the shape by drawing a ray from that point to infinity in any direction and counting the number of path segments from the given shape that the ray crosses.
trans-unit.target: **EvenOdd**會從該點朝任意方向繪製無限遠，並且計算給定圖案與光線相交的路徑線段數目來判斷"「 向內程度 」 的圖形上的點。

trans-unit.source: If this number is odd, the point is inside; if even, the point is outside.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個數字是奇數，則點即; 內如果是偶數，則點即外。

trans-unit.source: **NonZero** Determines the "insideness" of a point on the shape by drawing a ray from that point to infinity in any direction and then examining the places where a segment of the shape crosses the ray.
trans-unit.target: **為非零，** "朝 」 圖形上的某個點決定從該點朝任意方向繪製無限遠，然後檢查圖案線段與光線相交的地方。

trans-unit.source: Starting with a count of zero, add one each time a Segment crosses the ray from left to right and subtract one each time a path segment crosses the ray from right to left.
trans-unit.target: 開頭為零，計數加一次光線從左到右和減一次路徑光線由右至左。

trans-unit.source: After counting the crossings, if the result is zero then the point is outside the path.
trans-unit.target: 計算交會後，如果結果為零，點則在路徑外。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it is inside.
trans-unit.target: 否則，會在內部。

trans-unit.source: ![Fill rule illustration](~/add/media/ref-mil-fillrule-stars.PNG "Fill rule illustration") FillRule Example ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ![填滿規則圖例](~/add/media/ref-mil-fillrule-stars.PNG "填滿規則圖例")FillRule 範例 # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: Indicates how the intersecting areas of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref> are combined.
trans-unit.target: 指出如何交集區域的此<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref>結合。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `EvenOdd`.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 `EvenOdd`。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.FillRule*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.FillRule*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.FillRule*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> and a tangent vector on this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref> at the specified fraction of its length.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref>和正切函數在此向量<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref>在它的長度指定的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The fraction of the length of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 這個長度的分數<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains the location on this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref> at the specified fraction of its length.
trans-unit.target: 此方法傳回時，包含在此位置<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref>在它的長度指定的一部分。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數未初始化便傳遞。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains the tangent vector.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法傳回時，包含正切函數的向量。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數未初始化便傳遞。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref> object is empty.
trans-unit.target: 決定是否此<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref>物件是空的。

trans-unit.source: **true** if this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref> is empty; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: **true**如果這個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref>是空的否則**false**。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref> object may have curved segments.
trans-unit.target: 決定是否此<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref>物件弧形線段。

trans-unit.source: **true** if this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref> object may have curved segments; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: **true**如果這個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref>物件弧形片段，否則**false**。
